transcript.text: Warning: this video won't be very funny, it's quite the opposite
But I need to do it, I need to externalise what I think
Yesterday I went at YouTube's
To get my 10M subscribers button
There it is! Bravo! It's yours as much as it's mine, all of this is thanks to you
It's just an object, I had to go and get it
It's a symbol, but it's not the reason I'm making this video
It's for what happened after:
Yesterday I posted a photo where I'm holding the button
Saying 'thank you' because it's really... It's crazy.
The life I'm living, it's exceptionnal, but we'll get to it later
And! And under this post,
I received thousands, ten thousands
Of messages
So, so kind. The most moving messages
The most sincere, and the most well-written messages I've ever seen
In all my career. And I was so moved,
You know what? I'll tell you, honestly, I cried in my bithtub, naked...
"In my BITHTUB" ?
I cried in my bathtub, I was taking a shower and I started to cry
because I realised how much what is happening to me is incredible
And I think that the human being is not designed to receive that much love
in the face, all at once like that, really
I NEED to do this video to externalize that
And to send all  that love back to you
because you are 10 millions, but when 10 million people send me love, I'm alone
And it feels really weird
I'm not gonna show you the messages I got, because some of them were really personnal
but believe me, those were the purest and most sincere things I've ever read
And it made me realize how much of an impact I had on the lives of people
How much I  can help them go through their problems
And help them see life as good as it can be, it's that simple
And I really realized it yesterday
I was 100% lucid with all those messages
And it felt exceptionnaly good, it made me rethink some points
You know, on YouTube, we all have periods of doubt
We all want to give the best of ourselves, make better
Even make better than the others, and we forget that the important is
that we can make people forget a lot of bad things
We teach them sometimes, we make them have a good time
And it's been like that for 7 years
I receives messages from people that said:
"Dude, I grew up with you! When you were 14, I was 14 too"
"Now we both are in our twenties, and I still watch your videos"
And i think it's crazy to grow up virtually with people
To have been with them during their teenages years, it's incredible
And I never realized that
I forget about the past very often, I don't rememer enough of it
And it punched me, big time
SO I didn't prepared any speech or anything to read
I just needed to talk to you
Because I had the 10M subscribers
And I didn't do anything, because the 10M special video is not ready
I'll be there in June, I'm gonna shoot it in May
I'll be 2 weeks of filming, i'll be awesome
But I didn't want to make a video just to say "it'll be there in June!"
"See you tomorrow for another video!"  it was a little bit weird
So I didn't do anything
But I still have that feeling,
that "f*ck, dude, it's happened" and it's important to talk about it
to externalize, because it's a lot for a 22 year old guy...
I don't know if you realize... it's positive, of course!
but my life is amazing, it's just amazing
I didn't have to go through boring odd jobs
When I started on YouTube, I was 15, I was really young
It was huge for me, and I think at that time
I didn't have what it takes to handle something that big
Being a personnality, being juged, being under the spotlight
And of course it's normal
But you may not be ready
And every person I met,
wether TouTubers friends, or just friends, or YOU
allowed me to be what I am today
And to live the life I live, and I'm so happy
You can't imagine how much you've helped me building myself
At an age when I was psychologically unstable
And when I needed that help to build myself
I never talked about it before but it is really what I think
If I am like this today, it's thanks to that, thanks to you watching my videos
Thanks to your messages, thanks to all of those I met in conventions,
to all of you I've hugged
All of that helped building my personnality and who I am today
And i't just crazy. IF I COULD go back 10 years in the past,
And tell little Lucas, who plays Dofus,
"Dude, don't worry. You're a loser with girls, you're a geek,
nobody understands you, but don't give up because in 10 years,
there'll be 10 millions people
who'll be suscribed and who'll love what you do..."
Well, honestly...
Little Lucas would've been shocked, he wouldn't have understand
And it would change my destiny, and maybe I wouldn't have ended up YouTuber
There's not much more to say, except thank you, thank you, thank you
I didn't think that this f*cking button would've cause me such a shock yesterday, after the photo
you sent me WAVES of LOVE
I've never seen something like that IT'S INCREDIBLE!
It's CRAZY all the love I've received yesterday,
even now, it keeps going, and i'm so...
so moved by all of this, and i NEED to talk about it, ok?
I need to externalize! my little heart is like "Lucas there's too much love for only one man!"
"I can't handle it! send it back!! be careful!"
Anyway, since the day I started making less videos, 2 per week instead of 4,
I'm so much more blooming
I still have phases of doubt but it's normal, every creative person knows that
And I just wanted to send you a true message
I think that's how I'll title the video, "a true message"... yeah! not bad!
So! All of that is very beautiful but it's only one-sided
I was just telling you how much love you brought me, but what I have to tell you today
it's just... try to always see the positive
even when there's just a tiny piece of it, there's always positive
You can always say "it could've been worse", always
even when it's disastrous, you can always see it
me, as I told you, I can give you all the advices in the world, but
I'm not legit, I have a life that's... that's...
I'm too lucky. I really have an extraordinary luck
So I don't know what advice I can give you
Because you have more experience than I do, except if you're 8...
But here it is: focus on the positive, hang on to your passions, go ahead
When people tell you
"don't do it", well you have to say to yourself
"I was told not to do it, so maybe I have to do it!" HEY ISN'T THAT IN A SONG?
IT'S ORELSAN WHO SANG IT IN A SONG!
But it's really what I think because that's what happened to me
That "i want to go that way" but people thell me "no, no, no, don't, don't, don't"
And I still did it, and even though i had A VERY HUGE AMOUNT of luck
A lot of people went the same way and didn't have the same story than me.
They had less luck, it didn't work out well for them, and it's sad
But still
Do what you must to be happy, focus on the positive
And send love to your close ones, to the people around you
surround yourself with good people
there are a lot of as*holes in this world, but there are also a lot of good people
and  we often tend to forget about it, and only see the negative
and I'm telling you, I've lived like that for years, seeing only the negative
and today I can finally see only the positive
And voilà. I don't think I have much more to say
I didn't prepared anything, it was a little bit chaotic but anyway
I don't make lots of videos like this one where I talk to you, so... do I have something else to say?..
Well, no
Well, no, I think it's all. Haa, that feels good
That felt good... I'm happy
Kisses to you all, have a lovely weekend
I'll see you on Sunday for another video
and I hope this one didn't bore you as hell, errr...
and if it did, well give it a thumb down, no problem
kisses, see you soon, goodbye everybody ♥
Thank you
